verses.name: Acts 24:9
verses.text: And the Jews also assented, saying that these things were so.

verses.name: Acts 24:10
verses.text: Then Paul, after that the governor had beckoned unto him to speak, answered, Forasmuch as I know that thou hast been of many years a judge unto this nation, I do the more cheerfully answer for myself:

verses.name: Acts 24:11
verses.text: Because that thou mayest understand, that there are yet but twelve days since I went up to Jerusalem for to worship.

verses.name: Acts 24:12
verses.text: And they neither found me in the temple disputing with any man, neither raising up the people, neither in the synagogues, nor in the city:
